XRP Price To Make A 40% Jump To $0.8

entry.title: Celebrating 15 Years of Bitcoin: Unraveling Satoshi Nakamoto‚Äôs Seminal White Paper
entry.summary:
Fifteen years ago, on a memorable Halloween night, Satoshi Nakamoto introduced the world to Bitcoin through a white paper that laid the foundation for decentralized digital currencies. Published on a cryptography mailing list, this seminal document provided a comprehensive solution to the long-standing double-spending problem without the need for a trusted third party.
A 15-Year Journey Into the Heart of Bitcoin‚Äôs Revolutionary Design
Today, 15 years later, we delve into the depths of Satoshi Nakamoto‚Äôs vision, exploring the revolutionary impacts of Bitcoin and how it has transformed our approach to currency, trust, and financial freedom. Nakamoto‚Äôs white paper, titled ‚ÄúBitcoin: A Peer-to-Peer Electronic Cash System,‚Äù was a radical departure from conventional financial systems. It pro‚Ä¶

entry.title: Solana Deploys Nodes On Amazon Web Services, Here‚Äôs What We Know
entry.summary:
In a revelation at Breakpoint 2023, Solana announced a new milestone in blockchain accessibility and integration. For the first time, Solana nodes are available for deployment on Amazon Web Services (AWS) through the Node Runner app.
According to the official announcement, this development paves the way for enterprises and businesses globally to engage with the Solana network with ‚Äúunparalleled ease.‚Äù
AWS Cloud Makes Running Solana Nodes Simpler?
Solana has become the second blockchain supported by AWS Cloud‚Äôs Node Runner App, joining Ethereum in this integration. This marks a landmark, as it opens up new opportunities for businesses looking to harness the power of blockchain technology, the team behind the network claims.
With Solana‚Äôs nodes now accessible via AWS, deploying con‚Ä¶

entry.title: The Reformation of Money: Bitcoin‚Äôs Whitepaper And Its Parallels To Martin Luther
entry.summary: It‚Äôs that time of year when the leaves are changing, the chill of winter is in the air, and many of us in the Western world are once again gearing up for the holiday season. Thanksgiving and Christmas are important holidays for many and one of the best times to gather with family. Still, I would argue that one of the most important holidays is only celebrated by .01 percent of the global population. That‚Äôs right, I am talking about Whitepaper Day. It was 15 years ago today that one of the most important documents ever written was released to the world. The importance of this document is akin to Martin Luther, who published his 95 Theses in Wittenberg, Germany, on October 31, 1517. Satoshi Nakamoto must have been a student of history because there is little chance this was a coincidence and‚Ä¶

entry.title: Bitcoin Open Interest Enters Overheat Zone, Brace For Volatility?
entry.summary:
Data shows the Bitcoin futures open interest has risen recently and has reached a territory that has led to volatility for the asset in the past.
Bitcoin Futures Market May Be Becoming Overheated
As explained by an analyst in a CryptoQuant Quicktake post, the BTC open interest has entered the overheat zone following the latest rally in the cryptocurrency‚Äôs price.
The ‚Äúopen interest‚Äù here refers to the total amount of Bitcoin futures contracts open on all derivative exchanges in the sector. The metric naturally accounts for both short and long positions.
When the value of this indicator rises, it means that the investors are opening up more positions on the futures market right now. Generally, whenever this happens, the overall leverage in the market also goes up, and with leverage,‚Ä¶

entry.title: Bitcoin‚Äôs Fifteen Years Of Evolution: A Look Beyond the Original Whitepaper
entry.summary: Today is fifteen years from the date of the publication of the Bitcoin whitepaper. A lot has happened in that fifteen years. Bitcoin went through the blocksize war. A nation state has adopted Bitcoin. We are possibly on the verge of a Bitcoin ETF approval. Bitcoin in almost every way is nothing like it was described in the original whitepaper all the years ago. The network has grown, it has changed, it has evolved. On a social level, an economic level, and a technical level it's a completely different animal than it was all those many years ago. I feel like on this day, every year, people tend to focus on Bitcoin as it was all the way back in 2008. People get nostalgic about the basic design with no mention of mining pools, or ASICs, or second layer protocols. This year I wanted to do som‚Ä¶

entry.title: Biggest Movers: XRP 8% Higher, Hitting 10-Week High
entry.summary:
XRP was one of the biggest gainers on Tuesday, as price rose by as much as 8% in today‚Äôs session. The surge pushed the token to its strongest level since the middle of August, and closer to a key resistance zone. Toncoin was another notable gainer, climbing by over 6% today.
XRP
XRP, formerly ripple, was a strong gainer on Tuesday, as the token rose by as much as 8% in today‚Äôs session.
Following a low of $0.5634 to start the week, XRP/USD raced to an intraday high of $0.6127 earlier today.
As a result of today‚Äôs surge in price, the world‚Äôs fifth largest cryptocurrency rose to its highest level since August 15.
Today‚Äôs move saw XRP climb for a third straight day, pushing the token close to a ceiling of $0.6400.
From the chart, it appears that the relative strength index (RSI) has broken a resistance point of 73.00, and is now sitting at 75.08.
In order to reach the aforementioned resistance level, the index will likely need to reach a ceiling at or above 80.00.
Toncoin (TON)
Toncoin (TON) was another notable gainer on Tuesday, climbing to a one-month high during the day.
TON/USD hit a high of $2.23 earlier in the day, which comes a day after trading at a low of $2.09.
Owing to the move, toncoin rose to its highest point since September 28, when price was above $2.30.
Looking at the chart, recent gains have pushed price strength above a ceiling at 59.00, and the index is now tracking at 61.62.
The next visible point of resistance is at the 71.00 point, and if hit, there is a good chance TON moves towards $2.60.
Register your email here to get weekly price analysis updates sent to your inbox:
Do you expect toncoin to rise above $2.60 in the coming days? Let us know your thoughts in the comments.

entry.title: Sam Bankman-Fried Digs Himself A Hole As This FTX Execs‚Äô Text Thread Is Exposed In Court
entry.summary:
The trial of the former CEO of the defunct crypto exchange FTX, Sam Bankman-Fried (SBF), resumed on October 30 with the continuation of the defendant‚Äôs direct examination by his primary counsel, Mark Cohen.
This time, he and his lawyers seemed solely focused on changing the narrative that had already been put forward by the prosecution, including certain correspondences between Bankman-Fried and FTX‚Äôs former Director of Engineering Nishad Singh.
FTX Founder Says Messages To Singh Were Misunderstood
According to a report by Fortune, Bankman-Fried stated that Singh misinterpreted the text exchanges between them just before FTX filed for bankruptcy. In one of the exchanges, Singh had asked SBF if he was fine with him performing some backdated trades in order to get rid of his debts, as ‚Ä¶

entry.title: Everything You Need to Know About Coinbase's Layer-2 Network
entry.summary: Coinbase, a renowned digital asset company, recently made headlines with the launch of its Layer-2 network. This revolutionary development has the potential to transform the user experience and the efficiency of platform transactions. Understanding the Fundamentals Layer-2 solutions are protocols that are implemented on top of current blockchain networks in order to improve scalability and reduce transaction fees. The Layer-2 network is a strategic initiative by Coinbase to overcome the issues connected with the scalability of the Ethereum blockchain, on which Coinbase largely works. In essence, the Layer-2 network serves as an overlay, allowing for faster and less expensive transactions by processing them outside of the main Ethereum blockchain. This is accomplish‚Ä¶

entry.title: CBDC: Hong Kong Explores Advance Use Cases In Its e-HKD Phase 2 After First Trial
entry.summary:
Hong Kong has completed the first pilot phase of its central bank digital currency (CBDC), the digital Hong Kong dollar (e-HKD).¬†The Hong Kong Monetary Authority (HKMA) is now preparing for the second phase of the CBDC pilot program.
The Pilot, which started in November 2022, evaluated the CBDC‚Äôs commercial viability as part of Hong Kong‚Äôs Fintech 2025 implementation strategy.¬†
The HKMA To Explore More Use Cases For e-HKD
According to the initial report, the phase 1 pilot assessed e-HKD utility in six key areas. These areas included programmable payments, full-fledged payments, offline payments, Web3-based transactions settlements, tokenized deposits, and tokenized assets-based settlements.
The latest report outlined tokenization, programmability, and atomic settlement as the prima‚Ä¶

entry.title: 'Art of the Times': Art Blocks Founder Erick Calderon on the State of Generative Art
entry.summary: Art Blocks founder and CEO Erick Calderon sat down with Sander Lutz, lead culture reporter at Decrypt's SCENE, at Art Blocks Marfa Weekend 2023. They discuss the evolution of the company and the generative art world, along with what draws art enthusiasts to be an active part of the community.

entry.title: Decrypt Learn: Digital Ownership Explained
entry.summary: One of the most powerful aspects of blockchain technology is its ability to provide us genuine ownership of our digital assets. This is called digital ownership. In this video, we‚Äôll deep dive into digital ownership, why it matters, and how web3 makes owning digital assets like our social networks, music libraries, personal data, and beyond possible. Author: Clarissa Watson, Senior Writer at Consensys.

entry.title: Martin Shkreli on E/ACC and SBF in Prison
entry.summary: Reza Jafery and Martin Shkreli sit down for a casual conversation about the growing movement that is E/ACC, what songs they could recite at gunpoint, and whether or not SBF will thrive or just survive during his time in prison.

entry.title: What Can AI Do in Gaming?
entry.summary: AI Arena CEO Brandon Da Silva and COO Wei Xie discuss how artificial intelligence can shape the video game experience.
